Variable.name: doArchive
Variable.Description: Set to true to enable archiving role versions.

Variable.name: doOverlapAnalysis
Variable.Description: Set to true to enable role overlap analysis.

Variable.name: overlapThreshold
Variable.Description: Minimum overlap percentage in any facet a role must have to be included in the result.

Variable.name: approvalObject
Variable.Description: New version of role to approve

Variable.name: approvalType
Variable.Description: Set to "delete" when deleting roles. Set to "rollback" when restoring an archive. Otherwise null.

Variable.name: approvalSource
Variable.Description: Where in the UI we are requesting the approval. Values: modeler, directed, undirected, certification.

Variable.name: impactAnalysisOwner
Variable.Description: Name of user to receive impact analysis result

Variable.name: roleName
Variable.Description: Role name referenced by the email templates

Step.name: start
Step.Description: Copy the role name to a variable for easier reference in the email template. Skip to approvals if there is no impact analysis owner.

Step.name: Impact Analysis
Step.Description: Call a handler method to launch the impact analysis task.

Step.name: Review Analysis
Step.Description: Wait for review of the impact analyis report.

Step.name: Check Approvals
Step.Description: Skip approvals if the launcher is also the (previous) role owner.

Step.name: Approve
Step.Description: Single stage approval by the role owner. The handler method will build a suitable Approval object.
